meanings.sent1: The lion felt uncaged in the vast savannah.
meanings.sent2: The bird flew freely in the uncaged sky.
meanings.sent3: The uncaged puppy happily explored the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her uncaged spirit soared with newfound freedom.
meanings.sent5: The uncaged butterfly danced gracefully in the garden.

meanings.definition: Released from a cage or enclosure
meanings.sent1: The uncaged tiger roamed the jungle with power.
meanings.sent2: The uncaged parrot chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The uncaged hamster surprised the family by running around the house.
meanings.sent4: His uncaged emotions flooded out after years of suppression.
meanings.sent5: The uncaged prisoner felt the cool breeze of liberty on his face.
